attributes.action: Close academic institutions/workplaces Immediately due to Covid-19 -coronavirus.
attributes.additional_details: The Coronavirus will spread and this is a matter of urgency.Many people are dying and we cant risk losing people in this country. If this does spread then there will be a huge problem to the population of the United Kingdom as it will decrease with many people dying and people who have confirmed cases. When there is a choice between our education/work or our health. I believe it should be our health.
attributes.background: Close all academic institutions/workplaces with provided sick pay immediately so that the Coronavirus (Covid-19) does not spread. Even if they are supported by multi-academy trusts

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301439
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300628
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300403
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301652

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
